Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to requiring the New York state design and construction corporation to meet and conduct all business at a public meeting and making the minutes of such meetings available to the public
Summary: Relates to requiring the New York state design and construction corporation to meet and conduct all business at a public meeting and to making the minutes of such meetings available to the public.
LawCode: Amd ยง1678-a, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the New York state design and construction corporation to meet and conduct all business at a public meeting and making the minutes of such meetings available to the public
